Pre-Game Insights: The San Francisco Giants are turning back to another one of their top pitching prospects, Mason Black, to start vs. Miami on Saturday night at Oracle Park.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Mason Black, a 24-year-old right-hander, is the Giants' No. 8 prospect per MLB.com.
Black has spent the bulk of his season with Sacramento, where he has gone 5-6 with a 4.59 ERA.
The Giants have tapped into their young pitchers, with Hayden Birdsong recently graduating from prospect rankings and Kyle Harrison in the rotation.
Others: The Giants will need to make a move to open up a spot for Black to make his first start since May 17.
Black has a 0-1 record and an 8.79 ERA in his previous starts.
